name: Doomsday Derby
description:
Play this pixelated style indie derby game!

destroy the cars that want to destroy you with you powerful gun and missiles in a battle arena.

In this arcade style mini game you must survive and beat the record of seconds alive.
Face the aliens that put the giant worm in the land and get the diamons to get more strong cars ....
keep destroying them into pieces! feels good!

Avoid the chickens and loot the destroyed cars with Health Armor and Ammo!

Be carefull with the aliens! they drop a big worm on the arena, destroy it and get the green gems to unlock new cars!

FEATURES
  • High quality graphics with pixelated style made in Unreal Engine less than 2 gb
  • Shoot missiles and use your mini gun to destroy others cars
  • Cool sounds and music with an arcade style
  • Aliens will drop a big worm on the arena, destroy them and get the green gems to get other cars
  • Be carefull with the chicken-mine that will take your green gems
  • Nitro, Reset Car, Drifting, great explosions and more!
  • OBJETIVE: JUST STAY ALIVE!!!

Enjoy this release from our studio LFR Games
